import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Col,Row, ListGroup, Image, Card, } from 'react-bootstrap' import{Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const addDecimels = (num) => { return (Math.round(num * 100)/ 100).toFixed(2) } const cart = useSelector( state=> state.cart) cart.itemsPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0) cart.shippingPrice = cart.itemsPrice > 100 ? 0 : 100 cart.taxPrice = addDecimels(Number(.15 * cart.itemsPrice).toFixed(2)) const placeOrderHandler = () => { console.log('place order') } return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city},{cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{cart.shippingAddress.country},

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Your cart is empty : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items ${cart.itemsPrice} Shipping ${cart.shippingPrice} Tax ${cart.taxPrice} Total ${cart.totalPrice} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
